name: Gravitatis Platform
description:
Description:

This is a platformer in which you press the space bar, the cube changes gravity, passing obstacles, in this version only 11 locations, but the difficulty of passing remains.
Good luck!

Movement:
  • D - Right
  • A - Left
  • Space - Change gravity
  • Esc - Menu
  • R - Retry

Did you find a bug? Or just want to learn more about the game. Join our Discord server
